  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120414</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120414</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Položaj nadzvočnega letala</string>
            <string language="en">The Location of a Supersonic Airplane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Standort eines Überschallflugzeuges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'emplacement d'un avion supersonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A posição de um avião supersonic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La posizione di un aeroplano supersonico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θέση ενός υπερηχητικού αεροπλάνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La localización de un aeroplano supersónico</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Letolo leti z nadzvočno hitrostjo nad opazovalcem, ki posluša zvok motorja.</string>
            <string language="en">The plane is flying with supersonic speed above the observer that is listening to the sound of the engine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nadzvočna hitrost</string>
            <string language="en">supersonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zvok</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Fläche fliegt mit Überschallgeschwindigkeit
über dem Beobachter, der zum Ton der Maschine hört.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'avion vole avec la vitesse supersonique 
au-dessus de l'observateur qui écoute le bruit du moteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O plano está voando com velocidade supersonic 
acima do observador que está escutando o som do motor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aereo sta volando con la velocità supersonica 
sopra l'osservatore che sta ascoltando il suono del motore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αεροπλάνο πετά με την υπερηχητική ταχύτητα επάνω 
από τον παρατηρητή που ακούει τον ήχο της μηχανής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El plano está volando con velocidad supersónica
sobre el observador que está escuchando el sonido del motor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überschall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">supersonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">supersonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">supersonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">suono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπερηχητικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">supersónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido</string>
          </keyword>
